SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Chain
Represents a filter execution chain for processing an HTTP request.
CleanupCallback
Callback representing a cleanup operation explicitly invoked by the framework.
Cors
CORS (Cross-Origin Resource Sharing) filter implementation.
CorsConfig
Configuration holder for Cross-Origin Resource Sharing (CORS) behavior.
Filter
Represents a request/response interceptor in the Jandle processing pipeline.
Handler
Represents a final request handler responsible for producing a response.
HttpRequestFilters
Attaches one or more HTTP filters to a request handler.
HttpRequestHandler
Marks a class as an HTTP request handler.
JandleApplication
Core entry point of the Jandle HTTP framework.
JandleLogger
Abstraction for logging within the Jandle framework.
JandleSyntaxException
Thrown to indicate a syntax-related error within the Jandle framework.
OnServerStart
Callback invoked after the HTTP server has successfully started.
RateLimiter
Filter implementation that applies per-client rate limiting using the token bucket algorithm.
Releasable
Represents a component that holds resources requiring explicit cleanup.
Request
Represents an immutable view of an incoming HTTP request.
RequestMethod
Represents supported HTTP request methods.
Response
Represents an HTTP response abstraction used to construct and send responses to a client.
ResponseCookie
Represents an HTTP response cookie and provides a fluent-style API for configuring Set-Cookie attributes.
SameSite
Represents the SameSite attribute of an HTTP cookie.
TokenStorage
Abstraction for storing and managing TokenBucket instances used by the rate limiter.
